project_descr: Support to the Organization of the Rio+20

outputs.output_descr:
The organization of an event to mark the 20 years of the Conference on Environment and Development (Rio ’92), held in 1992, and boost international efforts towards sustainable development was proposed by the then President of Brazil Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva in his speech to the 62nd United Nations General Assembly, in 2007. On December 24, 2009, through its Resolution 64/236, the UN General assembly unanimously accepted the offer of the Brazilian Government to host the Rio+20.

To reinforce the conceptual and political achievements reached in the 1992 Conference, the Rio+20 will address bot
